job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend
job.description: Parsable aims to improve the lives and experiences of frontline industrial workers by connecting them to the people information systems and machines needed to do their best work Companies like Heineken Grupo Bimbo largest bakery in the world Suntory LafargeHolcim and Corteva Agriscience rely on Parsables mobilefirst platform Connected Worker to empower their workers with modern digital tools that improve productivity quality safety and sustainability at scalebrbrstrongROLEbrbrstrongDo you like the idea of a highlyavailable welldesigned architecture Are you interested in solving complex large scale problems Were hiring a Senior Backend Engineer with deep experience developing complex highly scalable solutions embracing a customer first attitude Youll play a major role in designing and implementing backend services that interact with many different types of devices and an increasingly large number of users The ideal candidate is wellversed in more than one language and framework and has experience building backend services composed of lots of moving parts that interface via APIs and SDKs The current Parsable backend tech stack includes Nodejs Typescript Go Postgres MongoDB KafkabrbrstrongThis role is remote and must be located in the following States AZ CA CT FL GA IA ID IN IL MA MD MI MN MO NC NH NJ NY PA SC TN TX VA VT WA WI and Washington DC or in British Columbia CanadabrbrstrongstrongRESPONSIBILITIESbrbrstrongulliCollaborate with Designers Product Managers Dev Ops Frontend Engineers and Quality Engineers to deliver enterprisegrade products and systemsliliContribute to building next generation microservices both net new and breaking off from an existing monolith serviceliliDeliver features and enhancements to Parsable Products that are secure welltested and performantliliImprove test coverage in our endtoend integration and unit test suitesbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli6 years professional experience in backend web software engineering preferably SaaSliliMastery of Nodejs Typescript and Go developing services developing unit and integration testingliliDocker or other containerization technologies experienceliliRESTful API design and implementation best practices in web security crossbrowser compatibility issuesliliJenkins Cl pipelines and automation experienceliliExperience diagnosing repairing and preventing performance and optimization issuesliliGit use in a professional  workplace environment liliPositive solutionoriented mindsetliliEffective communication skills ie regularly achieve peer consensus provide clear status updates etcliliIntellectually curious with a background using data to measure and explore how to evolve our technology brliulBONUSbrulliWorking knowledge of MongoDB atlas or DocumentDBliliExperience writing event driven architectureliliFluent with SAML OIDC and other authentication schemesliliExperience working with Thrift GRPC WebsocketsliliRemote team work experienceliliPeak performance tech start up experiencebrliulAt Parsable we have a clear vision Build an inclusive and diverse organization in which differences are respected and valued By facilitating dialogue education community service and improving internal policies were creating a connected community in which everyone is accepted as their best most authentic self Parsable is committed to creating an employee population which reflects our customers and our communities We are proud to be an equal opportunity employerbrbr
